00015    class CheckerManual
00016    {
00017       private List<TreeNode> types = new List<TreeNode>();
00018       private List<UserType> userTypes = new List<UserType>();
00019       private List<TreeNode> reorderedTypes;

00036       public void WalkClasses(TreeNode node)
00037       {
00038          CheckerException exc = new CheckerException();
00039 
00040          node.Entry = new IdEntry();
00041          List<String> using_ = new List<String>();
00042          node.Entry.ReflectionObject = using_;
00043 
00044          // manually traverse the AST so we can first define all classes before references to them are made
00045          foreach (TreeNode n in node.Children)
00046          {
00047             if (n.Type == VnvdChecker.USING)
00048             {
00049                using_.Add(AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n.GetChild(0)).ToString());
00050             }
00051             else if (n.Type == VnvdChecker.NAMESPACE)
00052             {
00053                Qualifier q = AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n.GetChild(0));
00054                string ns = q.ToString();
00055 
00056                foreach (TreeNode n2 in n.Children)
00057                {
00058                   try
00059                   {
00060                      if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.CLASS)
00061                      {
00062                         n2.EntryType = EntryType.Class;
00063                         n2.Entry = new IdEntry();
00064                         UserType t = DefineClass(ns, AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(1)).ToString(), AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)));
00065                         n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = t;
00066                         t.Entry = n2.Entry;
00067                         if (IsAlreadyDefined(t.Name, t.Namespace))
00068                            throw new CheckerException(n2, "A type with the same name '" + t.FullName + "' already exists");
00069                         userTypes.Add(t);
00070                         types.Add(n2);
00071                      }
00072                      else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.INTERFACE)
00073                      {
00074                         n2.EntryType = EntryType.Interface;
00075                         n2.Entry = new IdEntry();
00076                         UserType t = DefineInterface(ns, AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(1)).ToString(), AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)));
00077                         n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = t;
00078                         t.Entry = n2.Entry;
00079                         if (IsAlreadyDefined(t.Name, t.Namespace))
00080                            throw new CheckerException(n2, "A type with the same name '" + t.FullName + "' already exists");
00081                         userTypes.Add(t);
00082                         types.Insert(0, n2);
00083                      }
00084                      else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.ENUM)
00085                      {
00086                         n2.EntryType = EntryType.Enum;
00087                         n2.Entry = new IdEntry();
00088                         UserType t = DefineEnum(ns, AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(1)).ToString(), AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)));
00089                         n2.Entry.ReflectionObject = t;
00090                         t.Entry = n2.Entry;
00091                         if (IsAlreadyDefined(t.Name, t.Namespace))
00092                            throw new CheckerException(n2, "A type with the same name '" + t.FullName + "' already exists");
00093                         userTypes.Add(t);
00094                         types.Insert(0, n2);
00095                      }
00096                   }
00097                   catch (CheckerException ex)
00098                   {
00099                      exc.AddError(n2, ex.GetLastError().Second);
00100                   }
00101                }
00102             }
00103          }
00104 
00105          lib.CustomTypes = userTypes.ToArray();
00106 
00107          if (exc.ErrorCount > 0)
00108             throw exc;
00109       }
00110 
00114       public void WalkClassExtendation()
00115       {
00116          CheckerException exc = new CheckerException();
00117          reorderedTypes = new List<TreeNode>(types);
00118 
00119          for (int i = 0; i < types.Count; i++)
00120          {
00121             TreeNode n = types[i];
00122             currentType = (UserType)n.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00123             searchPath = (List<string>)((TreeNode) n.Parent.Parent).Entry.ReflectionObject;
00124             searchPath.Add(currentType.Namespace);
00125 
00126             Qualifier extends;
00127             List<Qualifier> implements;
00128             if (n.GetChild(2) != null)
00129             {
00130                if (n.GetChild(2).Type == VnvdChecker.EXTENDS)
00131                {
00132                   extends = AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n.GetChild(2).GetChild(0));
00133                   if (n.GetChild(3) != null && n.GetChild(3).Type == VnvdChecker.IMPLEMENTS)
00134                   {
00135                      implements = AbstractHelper.GetImplements(n.GetChild(3));
00136                   }
00137                   else
00138                   {
00139                      implements = new List<Qualifier>();
00140                   }
00141                }
00142                else if (n.GetChild(2).Type == VnvdChecker.IMPLEMENTS)
00143                {
00144                   implements = AbstractHelper.GetImplements(n.GetChild(2));
00145                   extends = new Qualifier() { "System", "Object" };
00146                }
00147                else
00148                {
00149                   extends = new Qualifier() { "System", "Object" };
00150                   implements = new List<Qualifier>();
00151                }
00152             }
00153             else
00154             {
00155                extends = new Qualifier() { "System", "Object" };
00156                implements = new List<Qualifier>();
00157             }
00158 
00159             try
00160             {
00161                IdEntry ext = this.GetTypeIdEntry(extends.ToString());
00162                Type extType = (Type) ext.ReflectionObject;
00163 
00164                if (currentType.IsInterface && ext.ReflectionObject != typeof(object) && !((Type)ext.ReflectionObject).IsInterface)
00165                   throw new CheckerException(n, "An interface can only extend another interface, not a class: " + ((Type)ext.ReflectionObject).FullName);
00166                if (!currentType.IsInterface && !extType.IsClass)
00167                   throw new CheckerException(n, "Cannot extend interface or value type " + extType.FullName);
00168                if (extType.IsSubclassOf(currentType))
00169                   throw new CheckerException(n, "Circular extendation detected at " + extType.FullName + " and " + currentType.FullName);
00170 
00171                if (currentType.IsInterface && ext.ReflectionObject != typeof(object))
00172                   implements.Add(extends);
00173                else if (!currentType.IsInterface && !currentType.IsEnum)
00174                   currentType.SetBaseType(ext);
00175 
00176                for (int j = i + 1; j < reorderedTypes.Count; j++)
00177                {
00178                   if (reorderedTypes[j].Entry.ReflectionObject == ext.ReflectionObject)
00179                   {
00180                      TreeNode temp = reorderedTypes[j];
00181                      reorderedTypes.Remove(temp);
00182                      reorderedTypes.Insert(i, temp);
00183                   }
00184                }
00185             }
00186             catch (CheckerException ex)
00187             {
00188                exc.AddError(n, ex.GetLastError().Second);
00189             }
00190 
00191             try
00192             {
00193                foreach (var implement in implements)
00194                {
00195                   IdEntry imple = this.GetTypeIdEntry(implement.ToString());
00196                   Type t = (Type)imple.ReflectionObject;
00197                   if (!t.IsInterface)
00198                      throw new CheckerException(n, "Cannot implement a class or value type " + t.FullName);
00199                   currentType.AddInterface(imple);
00200                }
00201             }
00202             catch (CheckerException ex)
00203             {
00204                exc.AddError(n, ex.GetLastError().Second);
00205             }
00206 
00207             this.searchPath.Remove(currentType.Namespace);
00208          }
00209 
00210          if (exc.ErrorCount > 0)
00211             throw exc;
00212       }

00217       public void WalkClassMembers()
00218       {
00219          CheckerException exc = new CheckerException();
00220          bool hasMain = false;
00221          for (int i = 0; i < reorderedTypes.Count; i++)
00222          {
00223             TreeNode n = reorderedTypes[i];
00224             currentType = (UserType)n.Entry.ReflectionObject;
00225             searchPath = (List<string>)((TreeNode)n.Parent.Parent).Entry.ReflectionObject;
00226             this.searchPath.Add(currentType.Namespace);
00227 
00228             foreach (TreeNode n2 in n.Children)
00229             {
00230                try
00231                {
00232                   if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.FIELD)
00233                   {
00234                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Variable;
00235                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00236                      entry.Node = n2;
00237                      string ret = n2.GetChild(1).Type == VnvdChecker.FQUALIFIER
00238                                      ? AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(1)).ToString()
00239                                      : n2.GetChild(1).Text;
00240                      UserField field = DefineField(currentType, n2.GetChild(2).Text, AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)),
00241                                                           ret);
00242                      field.Entry = entry;
00243                      entry.ReflectionObject = field;
00244                      n2.Entry = entry;
00245                   }
00246                   else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.CONSTRUCTOR)
00247                   {
00248                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Constructor;
00249                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00250                      entry.Node = n2;
00251 
00252                      String[] parNames = AbstractHelper.GetParameterNames(n2.GetChild(2));
00253                      String[] parTypes = AbstractHelper.GetParameterTypes(n2.GetChild(2));
00254 
00255                      UserConstructor cons = DefineConstructor(currentType, AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)), parTypes, parNames);
00256                      cons.Entry = entry;
00257                      entry.ReflectionObject = cons;
00258                      n2.Entry = entry;
00259                   }
00260                   else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.METHOD)
00261                   {
00262                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Method;
00263                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00264                      entry.Node = n2;
00265 
00266                      String[] parNames = AbstractHelper.GetParameterNames(n2.GetChild(3));
00267                      String[] parTypes = AbstractHelper.GetParameterTypes(n2.GetChild(3));
00268 
00269                      string ret = n2.GetChild(1).Type == VnvdChecker.FQUALIFIER
00270                          ? AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(1)).ToString()
00271                          : n2.GetChild(1).Text;
00272 
00273                      UserMethod met = DefineMethod(currentType, n2.GetChild(2).Text, AbstractHelper.GetModifiers(n2.GetChild(0)), ret, parTypes, parNames);
00274                      if (met.Name.Equals(GeneratorManual.MAINMETHOD))
00275                      {
00276                         if (hasMain)
00277                            throw new CheckerException(n2, "Duplicate main method.");
00278                         hasMain = true;
00279                      }
00280                      met.Entry = entry;
00281                      entry.ReflectionObject = met;
00282                      n2.Entry = entry;
00283                   }
00284                   else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.IMETHOD)
00285                   {
00286                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Method;
00287                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00288                      entry.Node = n2;
00289 
00290                      String[] parNames = AbstractHelper.GetParameterNames(n2.GetChild(2));
00291                      String[] parTypes = AbstractHelper.GetParameterTypes(n2.GetChild(2));
00292 
00293                      string ret = n2.GetChild(0).Type == VnvdChecker.FQUALIFIER
00294                          ? AbstractHelper.GetFullQualifier(n2.GetChild(0)).ToString()
00295                          : n2.GetChild(0).Text;
00296 
00297                      UserMethod met = DefineInterfaceMethod(currentType, n2.GetChild(1).Text, ret, parTypes, parNames);
00298                      met.Entry = entry;
00299                      entry.ReflectionObject = met;
00300                      n2.Entry = entry;
00301                   }
00302                   else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.SCONSTRUCTOR)
00303                   {
00304                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Constructor;
00305                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00306                      entry.Node = n2;
00307                      UserConstructor cons = currentType.DefineTypeInitializer();
00308                      cons.Entry = entry;
00309                      entry.ReflectionObject = cons;
00310                      n2.Entry = entry;
00311                   }
00312                   else if (n2.Type == VnvdChecker.ENUMOPTION)
00313                   {
00314                      n2.EntryType = EntryType.Variable;
00315                      IdEntry entry = new IdEntry();
00316                      entry.Node = n2;
00317                      UserField option = ((UserEnum)currentType).DefineOption(n2.GetChild(0).Text);
00318                      option.Entry = entry;
00319                      entry.ReflectionObject = option;
00320                      n2.Entry = entry;
00321                   }
00322                }
00323                catch (CheckerException ex)
00324                {
00325                   exc.AddError(n2, ex.GetLastError().Second);
00326                }
00327                catch (InvalidOperationException ex)
00328                {
00329                   exc.AddError(n2, ex.Message);
00330                }
00331                catch (SymbolTableException ex)
00332                {
00333                   exc.AddError(n2, ex.Message);
00334                }
00335             }
00336 
00337             if (currentType.IsClass && currentType.GetConstructors().Length == 0)
00338             {
00339                UserConstructor uc = DefineConstructor(currentType, new List<string>() { "public" }, new string[] {}, new string[] {});
00340                uc.Entry = new IdEntry();
00341                uc.Entry.ReflectionObject = uc;
00342             }
00343 
00344             try
00345             {
00346                if (!currentType.IsInterface)
00347                   currentType.CheckInterfaces();
00348             }
00349             catch (CheckerException ex)
00350             {
00351                exc.AddError(n, ex.GetLastError().Second);
00352             }
00353 
00354             this.searchPath.Remove(currentType.Namespace);
00355          }
00356 
00357          if (exc.ErrorCount > 0)
00358             throw exc;
00359       }

00361       private UserConstructor DefineConstructor(UserType type, List<string> modifiers, String[] parTypes, String[] parNames)
00362       {
00363          MethodAttributes attr = MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.RTSpecialName;
00364          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00365          {
00366             attr |= (MethodAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(MethodAttributes), s, true);
00367          }
00368 
00369          IdEntry[] pars = new IdEntry[parTypes.Length];
00370          for (int i = 0; i < parTypes.Length; i++)
00371          {
00372             pars[i] = this.GetTypeIdEntry(parTypes[i]);
00373          }
00374          UserConstructor cb = type.DefineConstructor(attr, pars, parNames);
00375 
00376          return cb;
00377       }
00378 
00379       private UserField DefineField(UserType type, String name, List<string> modifiers, String _return)
00380       {
00381          FieldAttributes attr = 0;
00382          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00383          {
00384             attr |= (FieldAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(FieldAttributes), s, true);
00385          }
00386          IdEntry ret = this.GetTypeIdEntry(_return);
00387          return type.DefineField(name, attr, ret);
00388       }

00390       private UserMethod DefineMethod(UserType type, String name, List<string> modifiers, String _return, String[] parTypes, String[] parNames)
00391       {
00392          bool overrid = modifiers.Remove("override");
00393          if (overrid)
00394             modifiers.Add("virtual");
00395          if (!type.IsAbstract && modifiers.Contains("abstract"))
00396             throw new CheckerException("Cannot declare abstract method " + name + " in a non-abstract class: " + type.Name);
00397          if (modifiers.Contains("abstract"))
00398             modifiers.Add("virtual");
00399          MethodAttributes attr = MethodAttributes.HideBySig;
00400          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00401          {
00402             attr |= (MethodAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(MethodAttributes), s, true);
00403          }
00404 
00405          IdEntry[] pars = new IdEntry[parTypes.Length];
00406          for (int i = 0; i < parTypes.Length; i++)
00407          {
00408             pars[i] = this.GetTypeIdEntry(parTypes[i]);
00409          }
00410          IdEntry ret = KeywordToType(_return) != null ? new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = KeywordToType(_return) } : this.GetTypeIdEntry(_return);
00411 
00412          if (overrid)
00413          {
00414             MethodInfo m = type.BaseType.GetMethod(name, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(pars), null);
00415             if (m == null || m.ReturnType != ret.ReflectionObject)
00416                throw new CheckerException("No suitable method found to override: " + name);
00417             if (!m.IsVirtual)
00418                throw new CheckerException("Cannot override a non-virtual method: " + m.Name);
00419 
00420          }
00421          else
00422          {
00423             MethodInfo m = type.GetMethod(name, BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy | BindingFlags.ExactBinding | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic, null, LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(pars), null);
00424             if (m != null)
00425                throw new CheckerException("Method already exists: " + m.Name);
00426             if (type.GetInterfaceMethod(name, LibraryChecker.ToArray<Type>(pars)) != null)
00427                attr |= MethodAttributes.NewSlot | MethodAttributes.Virtual;
00428          }
00429          UserMethod metb = type.DefineMethod(name, attr, ret, pars, parNames);
00430 
00431          return metb;
00432       }
00433 
00434       private UserMethod DefineInterfaceMethod(UserType type, string name, string _return, string[] parTypes, string[] parNames)
00435       {
00436          MethodAttributes attr = MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.HideBySig | MethodAttributes.Abstract | MethodAttributes.NewSlot | MethodAttributes.Virtual;
00437 
00438          IdEntry[] pars = new IdEntry[parTypes.Length];
00439          for (int i = 0; i < parTypes.Length; i++)
00440          {
00441             pars[i] = this.GetTypeIdEntry(parTypes[i]);
00442          }
00443          IdEntry ret = KeywordToType(_return) != null ? new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = KeywordToType(_return) } : this.GetTypeIdEntry(_return);
00444 
00445          UserMethod metb = type.DefineMethod(name, attr, ret, pars, parNames);
00446 
00447          return metb;
00448       }

00450       private Type KeywordToType(String s)
00451       {
00452          if (s.Equals("void"))
00453             return typeof(void);
00454          return null;
00455       }

00458       private UserType DefineClass(String namespace_, String name, List<String> modifiers)
00459       {
00460          TypeAttributes attr = TypeAttributes.Class;
00461          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00462          {
00463             attr |= (TypeAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(TypeAttributes), s, true);
00464          }
00465          UserType tb = new UserType(name, namespace_, attr);
00466 
00467          return tb;
00468       }
00469 
00470       private UserType DefineInterface(String namespace_, String name, List<String> modifiers)
00471       {
00472          TypeAttributes attr = TypeAttributes.Interface | TypeAttributes.Abstract;
00473          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00474          {
00475             attr |= (TypeAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(TypeAttributes), s, true);
00476          }
00477          UserType tb = new UserType(name, namespace_, attr);
00478 
00479          return tb;
00480       }

00482       private UserEnum DefineEnum(String namespace_, String name, List<String> modifiers)
00483       {
00484          TypeAttributes attr = 0;
00485          foreach (String s in modifiers)
00486          {
00487             attr |= (TypeAttributes)Enum.Parse(typeof(TypeAttributes), s, true);
00488          }
00489          UserEnum tb = new UserEnum(name, namespace_, attr);
00490 
00491          return tb;
00492       }
00493 
00494       private IdEntry GetTypeIdEntry(String name)
00495       {
00496          Type t = lib.GetType(name);
00497          if (t != null)
00498          {
00499             if (t is UserType)
00500                return ((UserType)t).Entry;
00501             else
00502                return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
00503          }
00504 
00505          foreach (String s in searchPath)
00506          {
00507             t = lib.GetType(s + "." + name);
00508             if (t != null)
00509             {
00510                if (t is UserType)
00511                   return ((UserType)t).Entry;
00512                else
00513                   return new IdEntry() { ReflectionObject = t };
00514             }
00515          }
00516          throw new CheckerException("Type: " + name + " not found");
00517       }
00518 
00519       private bool IsAlreadyDefined(string name, string @namespace)
00520       {
00521          foreach (UserType t in userTypes)
00522          {
00523             if (t.Name.Equals(name) && t.Namespace.Equals(@namespace))
00524                return true;
00525          }
00526          return false;
00527       }
